Reference

All functions

bs_col()

Construct bootstrap column classes

bs_mar()

Construct bootstrap margin classes

bs_pad()

Construct bootstrap padding classes

card()

Specifies a bootstrap card

card_footer()

Specify the footer of a card

card_group()

Create a group of cards

card_header()

Specify the header of a card

card_image()

Specify the image for a card

card_subtitle()

Specify the subtitle of a card

card_text()

Specify the text of a card

card_title()

Specify the title of a card

sample_card()

Generate a random kitten card

sample_kitten()

Generate a placekitten image URL

sample_lorem()

Generate lorem ipsum text
